Articles.Content:
Hello fellow Kerbonauts,

I need some help making a Mk2 SSTO, I can make a Mk1 SSTO, but it has no cargo space, and I want to make a SSTO that can bring up a 1.25m space station(One FL-T800, two Gigantors, two mini Clamp-o-Trons, the 1k EC battery, and the RC-001S probe) I'd love some help, since I can't find anything. Thanks if you can help!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-14T15:26:46Z" title="06/14/2015 03:26  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 14, 2015</time> by legoclone09**
Have you checked spacecraft exchange? I have seen quite alot of ssto designs both containing mk2 and mk3 parts. Some of the designs are even pushing the limits of cargo %

Here's an example one, can lift 10 tons or so to LKO with enough fuel to deorbit and return:

![screenshot94.png](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/61004449/KSP/1.0/screenshot94.png)

For the mass you're bringing up you might get away with a three-RAPIER design.
Thanks, guys! I'll test these when I get home. Can you supply the .craft file to me so I can use it? (Red Iron Crown)

Sure, I shared the craft file and described the ascent profile in a post [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/121374-What-must-I-change-in-my-game-play-to-make-SSTOs-with-payloads?p=1940416&viewfull=1#post1940416). Check the action groups, I think that's an older craft file that doesn't have all the RAPIERs set to manual mode switching and added to the first action group. Other than that, it should just be a matter of swapping out my test payload for yours and strutting it.
Thanks, you're one of the nicest forum members from what I've seen!
